questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible outer casing?

What type of plug is visibly integrated into the device's structure?

What color are the visible metallic components of the plug?

Regarding the visible plastic, does its appearance indicate a glossy or dull finish?
Focusing on the plug, does its design suggest a standard or specialized configuration?
Does the device show any signs of visible damage or wear?
